sentences.english: The amount of time you spend alone has little to do with being lonely.
sentences.chinese: 你大部分獨自一人的時間想必和寂寞扯不上什麼關係。

sentences.english: We do not want to face US pressures on our own.
sentences.chinese: 我們不希望獨自承受來自美國的壓力。

sentences.english: But alone you must drink life's gall .
sentences.chinese: 然而生活的苦汁你必須獨自品嚐。

sentences.english: Hey you, out there on your own, Sitting naked by the phone.
sentences.chinese: 喂，那個獨自一人，隻身坐在電話旁的你。

sentences.english: He sometimes stays at the office alone when he's on a case.
sentences.chinese: 一忙起來，他就經常獨自一人待在辦公室。

sentences.english: He said Ms. Choi became upset when she found the dog alone at his home.
sentences.chinese: 他說崔順實發現小狗獨自待在他家以後變得很生氣。

sentences.english: When the panels started, I took a lonely seat in the back.
sentences.chinese: 當演講開始時，我獨自在後面找了個座位坐下。

sentences.english: As the report states, "Among these were five solo divers who could not get help."
sentences.chinese: 根據報告陳述，其中有5個獨自潛水者無法獲取幫助。

sentences.english: The brave young man voyaged single-handed in his yacht for months.
sentences.chinese: 勇敢的年輕人獨自乘遊艇航行數月。

sentences.english: Orangutan mothers face up to eight years of single parenthood raising their infants.
sentences.chinese: 猩猩母親則要做長達八年的獨自養育幼兒的單親家長。

sentences.english: Living alone in the wrong way, shore.
sentences.chinese: 陌上花開，生生相錯，獨自彼岸路。

sentences.english: Aron Ralston spent one hundred twenty-seven hours trapped and alone.
sentences.chinese: 阿隆羅爾斯頓花獨自被困一百二十七小時。

sentences.english: And when even was come, the ship was in the midst of the sea, and he alone on the land.
sentences.chinese: 到了晚上，船在海中，耶穌獨自在岸上。

sentences.english: He traversed alone the whole continent of Africa from east to west.
sentences.chinese: 他獨自一人從東到西橫越整個非洲大陸。

sentences.english: Some old people are often condemned to live alone.
sentences.chinese: 一些老人常出於無奈而獨自生活。

definition: to live alone/to spend time alone (or with a significant other)
once/already/former/previously/ever/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)
helpless/without choice/for lack of better option/grudgingly/willy-nilly/nolens volens/abbr. for 無可奈何|无可奈何[wu2 ke3 nai4 he2]
but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
all over the place/everywhere and all directions
